message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but I'm open to negotiation in later rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer.  Let's work together to get a deal done before the money starts to shrink.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I deserve a bigger share. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to divide the money.  Let's not let inflation erode our gains any further.
